routes.documentation: View departures for all routes from a stop

responses.label: Service departures from the specified stop for all routes of the specified route type; departures are timetabled and real-time (if applicable).

routes.documentation: View departures for a specific route from a stop

responses.label: Service departures from the specified stop for the specified route (and route type); departures are timetabled and real-time (if applicable).

routes.documentation: View directions that a route travels in

responses.label: The directions that a specified route travels in.

routes.documentation: View all routes for a direction of travel

responses.label: All routes that travel in the specified direction.

routes.documentation: View all routes of a particular type for a direction of travel

responses.label: All routes of the specified route type that travel in the specified direction.

routes.documentation: View all disruptions for all route types

responses.label: All disruption information for all route types.

routes.documentation: Get all disruption modes
View all disruptions for a particular route

responses.label: All disruption information (if any exists) for the specified route.

routes.documentation: View all disruptions for a particular route and stop

responses.label: All disruption information (if any exists) for the specified route and stop.

routes.documentation: View all disruptions for a particular stop

responses.label: All disruption information (if any exists) for the specified stop.

routes.documentation: View a specific disruption

responses.label: Disruption information for the specified disruption ID.

routes.documentation: Estimate a fare by zone
List all ticket outlets
List ticket outlets near a specific location

responses.label: Ticket outlets near the specified location.

routes.documentation: View the stopping pattern for a specific trip/service run

responses.label: The stopping pattern of the specified run_ref and route type. (NOTE: the departure sequence field should be used to sort departures in chronological order, however it is not always N+1 or N-1 of the previous or following departure. e.g 100, 200, 250, 300 instead of 1, 2, 3, 4)

routes.documentation: View all route types and their names

responses.label: All route types (i.e. identifiers of transport modes) and their names.

routes.documentation: View route names and numbers for all routes

responses.label: Route names and numbers for all routes of all route types.

routes.documentation: View route name and number for specific route ID

responses.label: The route name and number for the specified route ID.

routes.documentation: View all trip/service runs for a specific route ID

responses.label: All trip/service run details for the specified route ID.

routes.documentation: View all trip/service runs for a specific route ID and route type

responses.label: All trip/service run details for the specified route ID and route type.

routes.documentation: View all trip/service runs for a specific run_ref

responses.label: All trip/service run details for the specified run_ref.

routes.documentation: View the trip/service run for a specific run_ref and route type

responses.label: The trip/service run details for the run_ref and route type specified.

routes.documentation: View stops, routes and myki ticket outlets that match the search term

responses.label: Stops, routes and myki ticket outlets that contain the search term (note: stops and routes are ordered by route_type by default).

routes.documentation: View all stops near a specific location

responses.label: All stops near the specified location.

routes.documentation: View all stops on a specific route

responses.label: All stops on the specified route.

routes.documentation: View facilities at a specific stop (Metro and V/Line stations only)

responses.label: Stop location, amenity and accessibility facility information for the specified stop (metropolitan and V/Line stations only).
